definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching

sentences.english: The carbon atomic charge(Qc) on C-O bond described the structural differences among the isomers of aliphatic alcohols and was easy to obtain .
sentences.chinese: 容易获取，表征了醇分子同分异构体之间的结构差异。

sentences.english: The contents of eugenol and its isomers were most the pyrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 裂解产物中含量最多的均为丁香酚及其同分异构体。

sentences.english: A fast and convenient analytical technique was suggested to detect naphthol isomers directly and simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一种同时检测萘酚同分异构体的方法。

sentences.english: Evidently, living things can somehow distinguish between optical isomers .
sentences.chinese: 显然，生物体对这两种同分异构体能够有所识别。

sentences.english: The other isomer of butane is normal butane .
sentences.chinese: 丁烷的另一同分异构体为正丁烷。

definition: haloalkane (obtained from hydrocarbon by substituting halogen for hydrogen, e.g. chlorobenzene or the CFCs)
